reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major corneal conditions: infectious keratitis (~20 per 100k), corneal abrasions/trauma (~15 per 100k), corneal ulcers (~10 per 100k), corneal dystrophies (~5 per 100k). Total ~50 per 100k. Heterogeneous mix of infectious, traumatic, and degenerative conditions. Low confidence due to heterogeneity and limited comprehensive epidemiological data.
